introduction.section1: Vietnam is a unique destination. Magnificent and varied landscapes, natural parks, a cultural heritage and a rich historical heritage... From Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi, via Da Nang, each destination offers its own history and a different experience.
introduction.section2: Discover through our articles and our photos our travel in Vietnam region-by-region.

meta-description: Vietnam is a unique destination. Magnificent and varied landscapes, natural parks, a cultural heritage and a rich historical heritage... From Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi, via Da Nang, each destination offers its own history and a different experience. Follow our guide from region to region to discover our selection of must-see places. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
social-network-description: Vietnam is a unique destination. Magnificent and varied landscapes, natural parks, a cultural heritage and a rich historical heritage... From Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi, via Da Nang, each destination offers its own history and a different experience.

tour.title: Travel around
tour.subtitle: The country from region to region
